item.title: MSDN blog post from 2016: DO NOT, under ANY circumstances, create and/or modify Linux files using Windows apps, tools, scripts, consoles, etc.
item.description:
Pontifications

  • MSDN blog post from 2016:DO NOT, under ANY circumstances, create and/or modify Linux files using Windows apps, tools, scripts, consoles, etc.
    • Reading files from Windows on Linux is OK
    • Copying files from Windows to Linux is OK
    • Editing Linux files or modifying Linux files on Windows is NOT OK

item.title: Mikhail Popov: Plotting a course through charted waters: A website workshop on data visualization literacy aka introduction to the many different types of graphical charts
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Mikhail Popov: Plotting a course through charted waters: A website workshop on data visualization literacy aka introduction to the many different types of graphical charts - developed in R and source code is available!
  • Learn about: pie charts, bar charts, waffle charts aka square pie charts, histograms, desnity plots, violin plots, ridgeline plots, box plots, scatter plots, line charts, mosaic plots, stacked area plots, heatmaps, treemaps, choropleths, etc.
    • static version
    • interactive version

item.title: How to setup github credential caching on Windows Linux subsystem
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Just one command from How to use Git credential store on WSL (Ubuntu on Windows)?:
git config --global credential.helper cache
  • I didn't have to change the timeout in ~/.gitconfig but just in case here's the line to add
[credential]
        helper = cache --timeout=144000

item.title: Google Play Store has a Review Reply API!
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Even better news than yesterday's Zendesk has a Google Play Store Review Reply Integration, there is a Google Play Developer Reply to Reviews API!
  • Yes! I'd love to write my own reply tool (or more likely get somebody to write one for me :-) )

xfce4-session

item.title: Getting jekyll, surge etc to work on Windows Linux Subsystem
item.description:
Pontifications

  • have to re-compile ruby from scratch otherwise jekyll gem won't build, no idea why :-)
sudo apt-get update -y && sudo apt-get upgrade -y
sudo apt-get install -y build-essential ruby-full
sudo gem update --system
sudo gem install jekyll bundler
sudo gem install github-pages
apt-get install zlib1g-dev
sudo apt-get install zlib1g-dev
sudo gem install github-pages # don't need this
sudo gem install redcarpet
curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_8.x | sudo -E bash -
sudo apt-get install -y nodejs 
sudo npm install --global surge
